====================================
Bracket strings with large separation
====================================

This test ensures that the parser handles bracket strings separated by more than 1024 bytes
without crashing. This was a bug where the serialization buffer would overflow.

#[[]]

#[[]]

---

(program
  (bracket_string
    (bracket_string_identifier)
    (bracket_string_contents)
    (bracket_string_ending_identifier))
  (symbol)
  (bracket_string
    (bracket_string_identifier)
    (bracket_string_contents)
    (bracket_string_ending_identifier)))
